stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GRADED BY FEW THINGS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: I didn\'t like the subject matter of the class, but that isn\'t her fault. The lectures were really slow and much of the class was about nonsense. That being said put any effort into the class and you will pass with little stress.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GET READY TO READ
comments: She teaches as if everything she says is a fact. Readings are very dry. Come to class everyday because you\'ll never know when you\'ll have a Learning log. Rigid grading scale. I don\'t know if it was just me but the test questions were worded a bit weird. The material is so dry I really wish I wasn\'t forced to take it by the learning community.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GET READY TO READ  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Professor Guenther is great at teaching this class. However, she does assign readings that must be read in order to do well on the final and midterm. Attending lectures is pretty much mandatory because you are required to do in class assignments randomly. Overall, the course was straightforward and the content was fairly easy.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: "gender and sexuality" covers some very interesting material. However, prof Guenther teaches her opinion of gender as a fact, not an opinion. Personally, I don\'t fully agree with everything with her opinion but her POV was interesting. The midterm and final were based equally on the lectures and the readings(ADVICE:DONT GET BEHIND ON THE READINGS!)

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GET READY TO READ
comments: Sadly I had to take this class bec of Learning Community. Boring topic, LOTS of required reading, and she is not interesting. Definitely need to attend class, bec 16% of your grade is quizzes (8/20 classes were quiz day), plus half the material is only found in her lectures. 2 short essays, group presentation. Grading was straightforward though.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: She\'s a great professor who keeps lectures interesting. However, if you do not like reading or attending class, you have no chance at getting an A. She bases your grade on 5 pop quizzes, two 4-5 page essays, discussion attendance, and a group project (I personally hate group projects, but it wasn\'t hard). Just make sure you go to class and read!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: She is very strict about attendance. If you don\'t attend class you won\'t get an A. The curriculum was easy but the readings were long and dry. You really have to work for an A.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: The class overall was really great and I feel like I really learned a lot. You have to read though since that the exams include questions on the readings. Also, it is sort of hard to get an A only because the entire class is out of 100 points. But overall quite easy to get and A with effort.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GET READY TO READ  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES
comments: 6 pop quizzes. Best 5 scores are what counts. Doesn\'t let you use laptops to take notes so everyone\'s sitting here writing down everything as fast as possible not listening to anything she\'s saying. Super boring lectures. Gotta read. 1 group project that\'s pretty damn easy and simple so not too bad. Lectures are just painful af. And 2 4-5 pg papers

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: She very clear in class and her study guides were extremely helpful for the midterms and final. It is MANDATORY to read the material or else you won\'t pass the class. Much of the tests and all of discussion is based on the readings. Attendance is mandatory due to active learning exercises. Do all of the reading and attend class and you\'ll be fine

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Great professor. Straightforward material. Must attend lecture, read Readings of Soc. Bought Essentials of Soc. and didn\'t use it. Got an A in the class and basically memorized & understood notes. Pretty easy to understand material, just have to take the time to. Papers and exams are fair, just have to sit down and think before answering.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: The material is pretty straightforward, but there is a lot of reading and her lectures are overly-complex and rather boring. If you need soc 001, I\'d recommend you to wait to take it with a different professor if you can.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: She\'s an excellent lecturer but beware; her comments will anger some people, especially when you get to the section about race and ethnicity. Discussions depends on the TA, mines was ok, I heard that others were more helpful. Do the reading, go to lecture, and the essays and you\'ll be fine. She doesn\'t curve but drops the lowest midterm.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Professor G\'s class was pretty easy as long as you took notes, went to class, and did the reading. There was a lot of readings, but they were all interesting. The community event she had us go to were really helpful. Her tests are kind of tricky but if you read and study you will be fine. I learned a lot in this class and I recommend it.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: I don\'t understand why people think that there is a lot of readings. It can be a bit lengthy but its do-able. Plus, the readings were interesting! She is great professor and she is super nice and helpful when you go to her office hours/after class. Shes not easy but you have to put effort in order to get a good grade in her class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Interesting class. She knows her material well. Speaks clearly & doesn\'t give too much work. Lots of weekly readings. 4 midterms!! (no final, but drops lowest midterm) & 2 papers. No quizzes in Discussions. Her slides provide VERY GOOD notes. Offers practice tests for each of her midterms. I liked this class. She\'s a very good teacher

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Dont take her course. She makes the class more difficult than needed. long midterms and useless discussions. You have to go to lec to do well bc its all on the test. Lots of readings for them readings of soc book. Want an easy A get someone else

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: quizzes every week, NO final, BUT 3 MANDATORY GROUP PAPERS!!! Do NOT take this class if you hate group papers. Class participation depends on group evaluations, and people LIE!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: She is a great professor. Explains very well with lots of examples, interacts with the class. Not boring at all if you like the subject. Doesn\'t post lecture slides though, so you gotta go. gives enough time to write down from her ppt. Tests on lecture material and readings for discussion. interesting stuff and she is fair if you do the readings!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: She is not that hard but requires lots of reading in her class and quizzes too.
